Mora, M
Paniagua, P

Mañas, A
Avila, E
metadata.dc:description: The dilatation of the duct of Cowper's gland is known as Cowper's Syringocele, a rarely occurring pathology, usually of a congenital origin. We offer two new cases corresponding to a perforated Syringocele and a non-perforated Syringocele. We analyse the clinical, radiological and therapeutic aspects of this entity.
metadata.dc:title: Siringocele de la glándula de Cowper.
[Syringocele of Cowper's gland].
